description: Manage throughput of MongoDB database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database throughput migrate
commands.summary: Migrate the throughput of the MongoDB database between autoscale and manually provisioned.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb database throughput migrate --account-name
                                                --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                --throughput-type {autoscale, manual}

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database throughput show
commands.summary: Get the throughput of the MongoDB database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb database throughput show --account-name
                                             --name
                                             --resource-group

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb database throughput update
commands.summary: Update the throughput of the MongoDB database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb database throughput update --account-name
                                               --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--max-throughput]
                                               [--throughput]
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb database throughput update --account-name MyAccount --name MyDatabase --resource-group MyResourceGroup --throughput "500"
